Description

#What is Pixel Monster?

Pixel Monster is a simulation game where player creates creatures which can eat, mate and evolve.

Different body pieces on a create will affect its behaviour. For example, the 'Eye' tells the 'Leg' to chase other creatures around it. 

#How does it evolve?

When player finishes creating a creature, an unique byte array (DNA) is created to represent the creature including its behaviours and body pieces.

When two creatures mate with each other, their DNAs are mixed to form a new one. This new DNA is used to create the offspring, inheriting the characteristics from its parents.

Overtime, weak creatures die and strong creatures survive. Thus strong creatures produce stronger offsprings.

How to play

--- Clicks on the Crafting Table to create creature.

--- Five types of body piece can be used: Muscle, Eye, Leg, Mouth & Talon.

--- Creatures will attack creatures with different DNAs.

--- After creatures have gained enough energy, they can mate with each other to pass their DNAs to the next generation.

More Information: https://www.dannydaisun.com/pixel-monster
